message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I'm feeling generous today.
Alice, that's not a great start! Let's be fair to each other. I propose a 60/40 split.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is a better offer than your last.
Alice, we're getting closer. I'm willing to compromise, but 55/45 is my bottom line.
Bob, this is a fair offer. Take it or leave it, we're running out of time!
Alice, we're running out of time.  This is my final offer - it's a reasonable split. Let's close this deal.
Bob, I'm compromising again. This is a generous offer considering we're running out of time. Don't be greedy!
